kick.description: Removes a member from the server.

action.description: Used to enable or disable filters, and change their action.

list.description: Lists filters and their current settings.

base.description: Controls feeds from YouTube, Reddit, Twitch & more.

add.description: Adds a service to the feed list.

remove.description: Removes a service to the feed list.

list.description: Lists all services that the server has.

base.description: Controls where certain messages are logged in your guild.

actions.description: Sets where action logs are logged to. Run with no args to reset.

endswith.description: Purges messages that end with [term]. Supports wild*cards.

invites.description: Purges messages containing Discord server invite links.

includes.description: Purges messages that includes your term  Supports wild*cards.

not.description: Purges messages that do not include your term. Supports wild*cards.

startswith.description: Purges messages that start with your term. Supports wild*cards.

user.description: Purges messages that are from the user specified.

slowmode.description: Enables message rate limiting for the channel. Set to 0 or enter "disable" to disable slowmode entirely.

coinflip.description: Flips a coin that can land heads or tails.

move.description: Moves a message to another channel.

base.description: Create, delete or edit custom commands.

botinfo.description: Gets information about almost any public bot via discordbots.org.

leave.description: Leaves the voice channel and dumps the queue.

unban.description: Unban a user from the guild.

emojify.description: Converts regular sentences to awesome emojified sentences ðŸŽ‰

mute.description: Stops a user sending messages while they're muted.

next.description: Goes to the next song in the queue.

show.description: Search for information about a TV Series.

weather.description: Get weather information from anywhere in the world.

catfact.description: Who doesn't like facts about cats?

cat.description: Kittens, cats, you name it - we've got it (maybe).

dog.description: Dogs. Just random pictures of dogs.

advice.description: Need quality life advice from a source you can trust? Then this isn't the command for you.

base.description: Manage warnings. Warn users for bad behaviour, edit previous warnings a user has and more.

add.description: Add a warning to a user.

funban.description: Bans a user but it's fun (and slightly spammy)

ban.description: Bans a user, exactly what it says on the tin.

submit.description: Submit suggestions to the suggestion channel.

donate.description: Donate to support Atlas and get awesome perks!
donate.fullDescription: Support Atlas by becoming a Patreon and get awesome perks in return!

help.description: View all of Atlas' commands or get help for a specific command or plugin.

yesno.description: Yes or no? Gets a random yes or no randomly.

ping.description: Check the time Atlas takes to reply to you!

support.description: Need help with Atlas? Join our Support server!

uptime.description: Check how long Atlas has been online for.

nowplaying.description: Shows information about the song currently playing.

play.description: Plays a song in your current voice channel.

qplaylist.description: Adds songs from a YouTube playlist to the queue.

queue.description: Shows upcoming songs in the player queue.

trumpgen.description: Generate an image of Trump's twitter tweeting something.

remindme.description: Set reminders to get notified in the future.
remindme.fullDescription: Set reminders to get notified in the future. Where [time] is in your sentence doesn't really matter. Atlas may round up the time it says but the actual time will be accurate.

captcha.description: Are you a robot? I know I am.

invite.description: Get Atlas in your own server by inviting me!

8ball.description: Ask the magic eight-ball a question.

guildMemberKick.title: Member Kicked
guildMemberKick.description: {0} has been kicked from the server.

roleRemove.title: Member Updated - Role Removed
roleRemove.description: {0} has had the {1} role taken from them.

usernameChange.title: Member Updated - Username Changed
usernameChange.description: {0} has changed their username from `{1}` to `{2}`.

avatarChange.title: Member Updated - Username Changed
avatarChange.description: {0} has changed their avatar from `{1}` to `{2}`.

permAdded.name: Permissions Added

hoistTrue.name: Hoist Updated
hoistTrue.value: The role will now display members seperately from online members.

hoistFalse.name: Hoist Updated
hoistFalse.value: The role will no longer display members seperately from online members.

mentionableTrue.name: @mention Updated
mentionableTrue.value: The role can now be mentioned.

mentionableFalse.name: @mention Updated
mentionableFalse.value: The role can no longer be mentioned.

messageUpdate.description: A message by {0} has been updated in {1}.

ban.noArgs: Please include a user to ban!
ban.error: An error occured banning {0}. This could be a temporary error, or you are lacking permissions to ban that user.
ban.tooLateReason: {1} has already been banned with the reason `{0}`.

remindme.invalid: That is not a valid date.
remindme.setForPast: Please give me a date that is in the future.
remindme.furtherPls: The time must be five seconds or more in the future.
remindme.youGotIt: You got it, I'll remind you in {0}.
remindme.relative: Also, in the future you should use relative time, for example `in 1 hour` or `in 2 days` instead of a specific time like `at 5pm today` or `21/08/2018` due to timezones that I can't handle

ping.server: I have a `{0}ms` delay to this server.
ping.dm: I have a `{0}ms` delay to this dm.
randoms: In my defense, this is still faster than you could do it...
Waiting for the stars to align...
Hello my name is Atlas what would you like today Sir?...
You were expecting something mildly entertaining, but no...
Hang on a sec, it's here somewhere...

commands.donate: Support Atlas and get awesome perks in return by donating at <https://www.patreon.com/NotSylver>.
commands.invite: You can get Atlas for your own server at <https://get-atlas.xyz/get>.

help.title: Need some help?
help.description:
You can do `{0}<command>` to run a command, or `{0}help <command>` for information about a specific command. You can do `{0}help <command> <subcommand>` for information about subcommands. 

Commands marked with an \* asterisk have subcommands.

embed.title: Atlas
embed.description:
Atlas is a multifunctional Discord bot that makes your life easier. Atlas has music, auto-moderation, tickets, auto-role, custom commands, extensive customisation options and a lot more. Atlas is using JavaScript through [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) and the [Eris](https://abal.moe/Eris/) library to interact with Discord's API.

You can do `{0}help` for a list of all commands Atlas has.

whois.noUser: You have to tell me who to look up!

commands.support: Need help? Join our server at <https://get-atlas.xyz/support>.
